statements: SELECT id, rsid, chromosome, position, allele1, allele2, genotype FROM GenomicData;
SELECT rsid, position, genotype, chromosome, allele1, allele2, id FROM GenomicData;
SELECT allele1, allele2, rsid, chromosome, genotype, position, id FROM GenomicData;
SELECT * FROM GenomicData WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT id, rsid, allele1, allele2 FROM GenomicData WHERE genotype = 'AA';
SELECT rsid, chromosome, position FROM GenomicData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT allele1, allele2, genotype FROM GenomicData WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT * FROM GenomicData WHERE position BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY rsid DESC;
SELECT id, rsid, genotype FROM GenomicData WHERE allele1 = 'A' AND allele2 = 'T';
SELECT DISTINCT chromosome FROM GenomicData WHERE genotype LIKE '%GG%';
SELECT * FROM variants;
SELECT chrom, position FROM variants WHERE chrom = 'chr1';
SELECT variant_id, chrom FROM variants WHERE position > 10000;
SELECT * FROM genotypes WHERE sample_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT variant_id, genotype FROM genotypes WHERE genotype->>'GT' = 'AA';
SELECT * FROM variants WHERE chrom = 'chr1';
SELECT * FROM genotypes WHERE sample_id = '1234' AND genotype->>'GT' = '0/1';
SELECT chrom, position FROM variants WHERE position BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT variant_id, ref, alt FROM variants WHERE chrom = 'chr2' ORDER BY variant_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM genotypes JOIN variants ON genotypes.variant_id = variants.variant_id WHERE genotypes.sample_id = '5678';
SELECT * FROM genomics_data ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT sample_id, genotype FROM genomics_data WHERE chromosome = 1;
SELECT analysis_id, effect_size FROM association_results WHERE p_value < 0.05 ORDER BY analysis_id;
SELECT sample_id, age, sex FROM clinical_data WHERE condition = 'Cancer';
SELECT * FROM genomics_data WHERE chromosome = 2 AND position BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT * FROM genomics_data WHERE chromosome = 1;
SELECT sample_id, genotype FROM genomics_data ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT sample_id, age, sex, condition FROM clinical_data WHERE age > 50 AND sex = 'Female';
SELECT sample_id, p_value, effect_size FROM association_results WHERE p_value < 0.05 ORDER BY effect_size DESC;

SELECT g.sample_id, g.genotype, a.p_value, c.age FROM genomics_data g JOIN association_results a ON g.sample_id = a.analysis_id JOIN clinical_data c ON g.sample_id = c.sample_id WHERE c.condition = 'Healthy';
SELECT * FROM genotypes;
SELECT sample_id, allele1, allele2 FROM genotypes WHERE genotype_quality > 0.8;
SELECT sample_name, date_collected FROM samples ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT rsid, chromosome, position FROM snps WHERE chromosome = 22;
SELECT phenotype_id, p_value, correlation FROM associations WHERE p_value < 0.05 ORDER BY correlation DESC;
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT genotype_quality, allele1, allele2 FROM genotypes WHERE sample_id = 456 AND snp_id = 789;
SELECT snp_id, rsid, chromosome, position FROM snps WHERE chromosome = 3 AND position > 10000;
SELECT genotype_quality, allele1, allele2 FROM genotypes WHERE genotype_quality > 0.8 ORDER BY genotype_quality DESC;
SELECT * FROM associations WHERE p_value < 0.05 AND correlation > 0.5 ORDER BY p_value ASC, correlation DESC;
SELECT * FROM genomics_data_studies;
SELECT study_name, study_type FROM genomics_data_studies WHERE study_type='Clinical';
SELECT subject_name, subject_age, subject_gender FROM research_subjects ORDER BY subject_age DESC;
SELECT variant_name, variant_chromosome, variant_position FROM genetic_variants WHERE variant_chromosome='X';
SELECT * FROM study_results WHERE result_value > 0.5 ORDER BY result_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM genomics_data_studies;
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM genomics_data_studies WHERE study_type = 'Genomics';
SELECT subject_name, subject_age, subject_gender FROM research_subjects ORDER BY subject_age DESC;
SELECT variant_name, variant_chromosome, variant_position FROM genetic_variants WHERE variant_chromosome = 'X';
SELECT phenotype_name, phenotype_description FROM phenotype_data WHERE LENGTH(phenotype_description) > 100;
